document_title: Foreskin inflammation: Causes, signs and prevention
subsection_content:
1. Acute balanitis
Penis itching and discomfort; The foreskin area is red, swollen and painful; When urinating often, I feel burning and discomfort...
2. Chronic balanitis
The foreskin has a foul odor and often contains blood and white pus of unknown cause.; Painful urination, burning, itching; pain during sex; Significantly reduced libido because the body is always in a state of pain, fatigue, poor concentration...
